page.title: 17LANDSCAPE
page.content: Time and place are both measured using the Greenwich Meridian.The Meridian leaves the British Isles at Peacehaven and the point on the cliffs is marked by an obelisk. Residents of Peacehaven raised the money for the monument which was originally intended to celebrate the Silver Jubilee of King George V and Queen Mary.It is however dedicated to the memory of the king as he died before its completion. It is a source of pride to many of the older inhabitants of Peacehaven and it is always kept in agood state of repair despite the fact that it is exposed to all the gales and storms that hit the coast.
